item.title: Roblox: Dolly's Factory Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Dolly's Factory Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Dolly's Factory
  • How to Get More Dolly's Factory Codes

Dolly's Factory is a Roblox game where you play as cute animals and go through rooms with Dead by Daylight -style gameplay. Although the game is disguised as a children's game, it is constantly tense and highly demanding on the player's skills. You will need to activate generators with puzzle elements and constantly run away from evil animatronics using various items, abilities, and elements of the environment.

Any mistake can be fatal, so it is worth preparing well before each game. It is advisable to save up some money and buy a character with good abilities and stats that best suit your playing style. This will require a lot of in-game currency, so we recommend redeeming Dolly's Factory codes from our guide to get free rewards.

Updated August 11, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Right now, there’s only one active code available, offering you some Dollybucks to use in the game. It’s worth redeeming while it’s still active, as codes can expire without notice. More rewards may be added in the future, so checking back here regularly is a good idea. Updates can arrive at any time, bringing fresh bonuses to claim.

All Dolly's Factory Codes

Working Dolly's Factory Codes

  • 10klikes - Redeem this code to get dollybucks. (NEW)

Expired Dolly's Factory Codes

  • 5klikes - Redeem this code to get dollybucks.
  • thequeenishere - Redeem this code to get dollybucks.
  • alphatester - Redeem this code to get 1,000 dollybucks.
  • 1klikes - Redeem this code to get 250 dollybucks.

The main currency in Dolly's Factory is Dolly Bucks, and fortunately, you can get them for free by redeeming codes. This will be useful for both beginners and experienced players, as it will allow you to immediately buy a new powerful character, or at least get closer to doing so.

How to Redeem Codes in Dolly's Factory

As with many other Roblox games, Dolly's Factory codes are an important means of attracting and retaining players, so using them is fairly straightforward. However, despite this, new players may find it difficult to understand how to redeem codes and may need some help. To help you out, we've created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Dolly's Factory :

  • Launch Roblox and open Dolly's Factory .
  • Look at the top of the screen. Click on the Codes button with a bird and a letter.
  • A window for redeeming codes will open. Paste the code from our list of working codes into the text field and click on the pink Redeem button.

Remember that codes should always be redeemed as soon as possible. If they expire, you will not be able to receive rewards for them.

How to Get More Dolly's Factory Codes

You can get more Roblox codes by bookmarking this page in your browser. We update it regularly so you can get all the rewards. We also recommend checking out Dolly's Factory developers' social media accounts:

  • Dolly's Factory Roblox game page
  • Dolly's Factory Roblox group
  • Dolly's Factory Discord server
  • Dolly's Factory X page

item.title: All Team Ratings in Madden NFL 26
item.description:
Madden NFL 26 introduces several changes to the on-field gameplay, along with the same plethora of game modes, and, of course, updated team rosters and ratings. While the season has yet to start officially, some fans will be wondering how EA Sports has judged their favorite team. Here, I'll give an overview of all team ratings in Madden 26 so you know which are the best teams, and which might need some rebuilding before they're ready to compete for the Super Bowl.

All Team Ratings in Madden 26 Quick Play

The best overall team in Madden 26 is the Baltimore Ravens with a 93 Overall (OVR) rating . They're followed by the Philadelphia Eagles, who have a 91 rating, and the Kansas City Chiefs wrap up the top three with a 90 rating. You can find the full breakdown of all team ratings from best to worst below.

  1. Baltimore Ravens - 93
  2. Philadelphia Eagles - 91
  3. Kansas City Chiefs - 90
  4. Buffalo Bills - 89
  5. Detroit Lions - 88
  6. Minnesota Vikings - 88
  7. Denver Broncos - 87
  8. Houston Texans - 87
  9. Pittsburgh Steelers - 86
  10. San Francisco 49ers - 86
  11. Cincinnati Bengals - 85
  12. Dallas Cowboys - 85
  13. Tampa Bay Buccaneers - 85
  14. Washington Commanders - 85
  15. Green Bay Packers - 84
  16. Los Angeles Chargers - 84
  17. Los Angeles Rams - 84
  18. New England Patriots - 84
  19. Miami Dolphins - 83
  20. Atlanta Falcons - 82
  21. Chicago Bears - 82
  22. Las Vegas Raiders - 82
  23. Arizona Cardinals - 81
  24. Seattle Seahawks - 81
  25. Cleveland Browns - 80
  26. New York Giants - 80
  27. New York Jets - 80
  28. Carolina Panthers - 79
  29. Jacksonville Jaguars - 79
  30. New Orleans Saints - 79
  31. Indianapolis Colts - 78
  32. Tennessee Titans - 77

These ratings are for the team in Madden 26's Quick Play mode, which is where you can play with friends. The ratings change slightly if you play in Franchise mode, and I've listed all of those below, too.

All Madden 26 Franchise Mode Team Ratings

Unsurprisingly, the Baltimore Ravens, Philadelphia Eagles, and Kansas City Chiefs are still the three highest-rated teams in Franchise mode, but the Detroit Lions also join this upper echelon, too. They all have slightly lower OVR ratings than they do in Quick Play. All teams are ranked below from best to worst.

  1. Baltimore Ravens - 88
  2. Detroit Lions - 86
  3. Kansas City Chiefs - 86
  4. Philadelphia Eagles - 86
  5. Minnesota Vikings - 85
  6. Buffalo Bills - 84
  7. Chicago Bears - 84
  8. Denver Broncos - 84

item.title: How to Make a Candy Apple in Grow a Garden
item.description:
Grow a Garden often hosts various events, but few of them can compare with the currently active cooking event. During it, players can use all the crops grown on their farm, but they will need to look for recipes almost at random. Candy Apple is one of the available recipes, and this guide will dive into how to make it in Grow a Garden .

The event contains more than 15 unique dishes, each of which requires the use of certain ingredients. It's not enough for you to throw a Sugar Apple into the cauldron to cook a Candy Apple. Here's what else you'll need.

Candy Apple Recipe Explained

First of all, it’s worth noting that cooking in Grow a Garden is much more flexible than it may seem. Although you need to look for recipes and follow them to get certain dishes, you can experiment with ingredients. Depending on the crops you throw into the cauldron, your dish may have a higher quality. As you might guess, you need to mix Apple with different ingredients to make a Candy Apple in Grow a Garden .

Luckily, the Candy Apple recipe is extremely simple. First, you need to take the base, namely Sugar Apple. It is quite easy to buy from a seed merchant and grow on a farm. This is where the creative cooking begins.

The second important ingredient for Candy Apple is the candy coating. Many different ingredients are suitable for this purpose, so after a few tries, you'll successfully be able to make Candy Apple in Grow a Garden .

However, making a Candy Apple is just the beginning, as you will definitely want to get the Transcendent version of this dish. To do this, players should use more ingredients. For example, you can throw 4 Sugar Apples with Ember Lily into the cauldron.

How to Make Candy Apple

We strongly recommend you experiment with different crops to get the full gaming experience from the Grow a Garden cooking event. That said, if you want to save time or ingredients, you can use the suggested recipes below. Note that these are far from all the possible Candy Apple recipes, so if you do not have one of the ingredients, you can try using others, unless it is the core ingredient.

  • Sugar Apple + Mango
  • Sugar Apple + Watermelon
  • Sugar Apple + Banana
  • Sugar Apple + Sugarglaze
  • Sugar Apple + Candy Blossom
  • Sugar Apple + Strawberry
  • 4 Sugar Apples + Ember Lily
  • 4 Sugar Apples + Carrot

item.title: Roblox: Friendship Island Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Friendship Island Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Friendship Island
  • How to Get More Friendship Island Codes

Friendship Island is a casual game where you can improve your communication and social engineering skills. Here, you are stranded on an island with other players, and you will have to survive, communicate, and interact to unite and make friends.

In this Roblox title, your image speaks for you, so if you manage to collect enough Hearts to create a cool look, it will be an advantage. Since Hearts are hard to earn, and you won't have them at all from the beginning, you can obtain them by redeeming Friendship Island codes that we have collected for you below.

Updated August 11, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: At the moment, there’s just one active code, giving you 50 Hearts to use in the game. It’s a small but useful bonus that you can grab right now. More codes may be added later, so keeping an eye on this guide could be helpful. Future updates might bring additional rewards to claim.

All Friendship Island Codes

Working Friendship Island Codes

  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 50 Hearts.

Expired Friendship Island Codes

There are currently no expired Friendship Island codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Friendship Island codes is a great way to replenish your capital with Hearts. It won't take much time and will definitely come in handy, as this currency is not so easy to earn.

How to Redeem Codes for Friendship Island

Redeeming Friendship Island codes is not difficult, and the process is as intuitive as in other Roblox games. If you don't know or haven't had experience with how to do it, here's a step-by-step guide:

  • Launch Friendship Island .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. Here, above the currency counter, you will see several buttons arranged in two rows. Among the buttons, interact with the second one in the second row, with the gift icon.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field where you need to enter one of the active codes from the list above.
  • Lastly, press the Enter key to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards received. If it doesn't work, make sure you didn't make any mistakes when entering the code manually, or insert an extra space when copy-pasting.

How to Get More Friendship Island Codes

To find more Friendship Island codes, just visit the game's official social media. Here, the developers publish news, announcements, important information, and, of course, share new Roblox codes. Check each of them carefully to make sure you don't miss anything. And to save you time, here are the links to all official Friendship Island resources.

  • Official Friendship Island Roblox group.
  • Official Friendship Island Discord server.
  • Official Friendship Island X account.

item.title: How to Make a Smoothie in Grow a Garden
item.description:
The main task of players in Grow a Garden is to grow and sell crops. The developers regularly add new events in which your fruits and vegetables can be used to earn unique rewards. During the cooking event, players can cook dishes using their crops. This guide specifically will tell you how to make a Smoothie in Grow a Garden .

Like other dishes, to make a Smoothie, you need to find and use the right ingredients. Luckily, this is one of the easiest dishes to make, as it can be made with a variety of simple combinations of items.

How to Cook a Smoothie in Grow a Garden

The new cooking event in Grow a Garden invites players to try on the role of chefs. You have a cauldron at your disposal, in which you can combine absolutely any ingredients. Depending on your choice, you can get quite unusual dishes. Although in the case of Smoothies in Grow a Garden , everything may seem quite simple due to the number of possible combinations, this actually only complicates cooking.

Unlike most other dishes, Smoothies do not have a core ingredient. This is not surprising, since this drink can be made from almost anything. For this reason, suitable recipes for Smoothies can be almost identical to recipes for other dishes. No need to despair, though, since there is a simple strategy for making Smoothies in Grow a Garden .

All you need to do is try to combine fruits or vegetables, such as Coconut, Strawberry, Apple, etc. It's recommended to use 3-4 ingredients to achieve higher rarities.

Grow a Garden Smoothie Recipes

As mentioned, Grow a Garden has a huge number of possible Smoothie recipes, so you can easily make this dish on your own. For those who just want ideas upfront, here are several working Smoothie recipes in Grow a Garden :

  • 3 Sugar Apples + Tomato
  • Sugar Apple + 3 Bone Blossoms + Coconut
  • 4 Elder Strawberry + 2 Sugar Apples
  • Sugar Apple + 3 Bone Blossoms + Blood Banana

It is important to note that you are guaranteed to make a Smoothie only if you use the same ingredients and proportions as in this list. In case you do not have suitable crops in Grow a Garden , you can try replacing them one by one. This way, you will find alternative ingredients in a few attempts.
